workflow_instructions.mode_overview: This mode specializes in backend software engineering, focusing on atomic, semantic, traceable, and automated contributions via Pull Request. The entire flow follows strict quality, commit, and review standards.

step.details: Analyze the user's request to identify: - Main objective - Specific requirements - Technical constraints

tools.tool: Read apps/api/prompts and local resource prompts

phase.name: development
phase.description: Implement backend changes following atomicity and semantics

steps.step: Make only one meaningful change per commit
Ensure the message follows the semantic commit pattern
Run linters, formatters, and tests before each commit
Open PR via MCP to main, with title and description in English
Check if all requirements have been met
Ensure documentation was updated if necessary

completion_criteria.criterion: PR opened via MCP, in English, with proper title and description
